wikipedia_page.main: Graham Clive Watts OBE MCMI FRSA MRICS FRIBA CIBSE (born 5 August 1956) is chief executive of the Construction Industry Council. He was also manager of Great Britain's fencing team at the 2004 and 2008 Summer Olympics and chairman of the National Dance Awards.  He was awarded the OBE in 2008.

response: * Graham Clive Watts, British construction administrator
*Graham Clive Watts, Chief Executive, Construction Industry Council. For services to the Construction Industry. (London, N11)
* Graham Clive Watts OBE MCMI FRSA FRIBA (born 1956), Chief Executive of the Construction Industry Council
